metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23852 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.4 has a signed integer overflow inXML_GetBuffer, for configurations with a nonzero XML_CONTEXT_BYTES.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
